## TargetType.businessProcessType property

Associated Business Process Type of this Target Type.

When saving a Target Type in context of a Business Process Type this property is automatically set. The link to the Business Process Type is always returned in its Primary Blueprint Parent context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get businessProcessType(): Link | undefined;
```
